name: Block Chaos
description:
Dodge flying shapes and grab glowing coins! Keep an eye out for power-ups that'll help you stay alive just a little bit longer. The longer you play, the more dangerous it gets. How high can you get your score?

Choose from a variety of colorful skins and groovy tunes and play to your heart's content. I hope you have as much fun playing it as I had creating it!

You can play with either the keyboard or the controller, and the controls are simple:

  • To move: For the keyboard, WASD keys or arrow keys. For the controller, use the control stick or the D-pad.
  • To select: Spacebar or the A button on your controller.
  • To exit: Just hit Escape or the B button on your controller.
